generic.title: Tests for the generic publication manifest

tests.description: Basic, correct manifest, usable to test the local setup
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: The manifest must have a '@context'
tests.actions: Return empty

tests.description: The manifest '@context' must contain the schema.org and the publication manifest context references.
tests.actions: Return empty

tests.description: The global language value can be set as part of the '@context' array
tests.actions: Language en set for all strings

tests.description: The global language value must be valid BCP47
tests.actions: No effect on output (value ignored)
tests.errors: Validation error on incorrect BCP47 value

tests.description: The global base direction value can be set as part of the '@context' array
tests.actions: Direction ltr set for all strings

tests.description: The global base direction value must 'ltr' or 'rtl'
tests.actions: No effect on output (value ignored)
tests.errors: Validation error on incorrect base direction value

tests.description: If several global language, resp. base direction values are set, the last one wins in both cases
tests.actions: Strings should be set with language:en and direction:ltr

tests.description: The 'type' of the manifest should be set; if missing, 'CreativeWork' is added by default
tests.actions: The CreativeWork type should be added

tests.description: The 'type' value can be set to other values
tests.actions: no change on the document

tests.description: There should be a 'conformsTo' value in the manifest; a default is set if missing
tests.actions: Set 'profile' to user agents default

tests.description: The user agent has a set of profile references it understands, other values are ignored
tests.actions: Set 'profile' to user agents default
tests.errors: Validation error on no known conformance

tests.description: Non-default conformance value can be set that the user agent understands
tests.actions: Set 'profile' to the audiobooks profile value

tests.description: The value of 'abridged' must be a boolean
tests.actions: The value of abridged should be removed from the result

tests.description: Simple a11y terms can also be set as single literals
tests.actions: All values should be turned into arrays of literals

tests.description: The value of 'accessModeSufficient' has a strict structure per schema.org
tests.actions: The illegal value (visual) should be removed
tests.errors: Validation error on the incorrect data

tests.description: The value of 'accessModeSufficient' has a strict structure per schema.org
tests.actions: Both values being invalid, the key should be removed altogether
tests.errors: Validation error on the incorrect data

tests.description: https://www.w3.org/TR/pub-manifest/#address
All URL values can be relative, expanded via base
tests.actions: Value of URL should be absolute

tests.description: All URL values can be relative, expanded via basee
tests.actions: Value of all URLs in the array should be absolute

tests.description: The values of the 'url' term must be a valid URL
tests.actions: The invalid URL should be removed

tests.description: The value of 'id' must be a valid URL
tests.actions: Value of invalid URL should be removed

tests.description: The manifest should contain a value for 'id'
tests.actions: Output unchanged
tests.errors: Validation error on the missing ID

tests.description: Persons can be provided as single strings
tests.actions: Array of names turned into an array of Persons

tests.description: A single person is not required to be in an array
tests.actions: The single term is turned into a one-element Array of Persons

tests.description: An entity should have a name
tests.actions: The entry without a name is removed from the array

tests.description: All creators defined in the specification, and only those, should have the same behaviors (copy of m47502)
tests.actions: All the defined creator values should be turned into array; this does not apply to extra term ("auteur")

tests.description: Duration should have the right ISO format
tests.actions: Duration should be removed from output
tests.errors: Validation error on incorrect duration format

tests.description: Duration should have the right ISO format
tests.actions: Duration value should be present in the output

tests.description: Duration should have the right ISO format (also in a linked resource)
tests.actions: Duration should be removed from output
tests.errors: Validation error on incorrect duration format

tests.description: Duration should have the right ISO format (also in a linked resource)
tests.actions: Duration value should be present in the output

tests.section: §4.7.1.7 Last Modification Date and §4.7.1.8 Publication Date

tests.description: Both 'datePublished' and 'dateModified' must be in ISO format
tests.actions: Both 'datePublished' and 'dateModified' are incorrect, and should be removed from output

tests.description: Both 'datePublished' and 'dateModified' must be in ISO format
tests.actions: Both 'datePublished' and 'dateModified' are correct, and  should be present in the output

tests.description: The value of 'inLanguage' must be valid BCP47
tests.actions: Value of 'inLanguage' must be checked, and removed (as invalid)
tests.errors: validation error on incorrect BCP47 value

tests.description: The value of 'inLanguage' value may be an array, each element a valid BCP47
tests.actions: Incorrect values must be removed from the array
tests.errors: validation error on incorrect BCP47 value

tests.description: The value of 'readingProgression' value must ltr or rtl
tests.actions: Value of readingProgression must be checked, and set to the default 'ltr'

tests.description: The title (ie, 'name') can be set as a simple string, as an abbreviation for localizable texts
tests.actions: Convert the simple string into an array of Localizable string

tests.description: The title (ie, 'name') is a natural language text, the global language and direction must be set
tests.actions: Convert the simple string into a text labeled as English, and direction ltr

tests.description: The title (ie, 'name') is an array of natural language texts, each can have its language and direction set individually
tests.actions: Convert the two items into arabic and direction rtl for the first, and english and ltr for the second

tests.description: The 'readingOrder' can be expressed as a single relative URL
tests.actions: The input is converted into an array of a single object, with the 'url' set to the absolute URL

tests.description: All URL-s must be valid; invalid values are removed
tests.actions: The second entry in 'readingOrder' is removed from the final list
tests.errors: Validation error on invalid URL, and a validation error on removing the corresponding Linked Resource

tests.description: A missing 'readingOrder' is replaced by a default
tests.actions: A 'readingOrder' is added with a single link set to the HTML Nodes Document.URL. If none provided, validation error
tests.errors: Validation error on invalid URL, and a validation error on removing the corresponding Linked Resource

tests.description: Duplicate URLs generate warning but stay in the list
tests.actions: The output does not change

tests.description: The 'resources' can be expressed as a single relative URL
tests.actions: The input is converted into an array of a single object, with the 'url' set to the absolute URL

tests.description: All URL-s in 'resources' must be valid; invalid values are removed
tests.actions: The second entry in 'resources' is removed from the final list

tests.description: Duplicate URL-s removed from 'resources'
tests.actions: The third entry in 'resources' is removed from the final list

tests.description: The 'links' can be expressed as a single relative URL
tests.actions: The input is converted into an array of a single object, with the 'url' set to the absolute URL

tests.description: All URL-s in 'links' must be valid; invalid values are removed
tests.actions: The second entry in 'links' is removed from the final list

tests.description: Entries in 'links' must not appear in 'readingOrder'
tests.actions: The 'chapter1.html' entry is removed from  'links'
tests.errors: Validation error on a link appearing in bounds

tests.description: All URL-s (ignoring fragment id-s) in 'links' must be disjoint from the ones in 'readingOrder' or 'resources'.
tests.actions: The chapter1.html, link1.html, and link3.html are removed from  links
tests.errors: Validation error on a link appearing in bounds

tests.description: Cover page, toc reference, or pagelist reference should not appear in 'links'
tests.actions: The links2.html, links4.html, and links6.html entries should be removed from the final links; others should be listed.
tests.errors: Validation error on all three faulty links.

tests.description: Each entry in 'links' should have its 'rel' value set
tests.actions: Output should be unchanged

tests.description: Extra term values with, possibly, extra namespace declaration must be accepted and added to the output
tests.actions: The manifest should leave the extra values in the output

tests.description: Extra term values in entities and in linked resources must be accepted and added to the output
tests.actions: The manifest should leave the extra values in the output

tests.description: There should not be a repeated definition of cover
tests.actions: The second occurrence of cover should be flagged

tests.description: A cover referring to an image should have a 'name'
tests.actions: Validation error generation

tests.description: A cover referring to a non-image without a 'name' is fine
tests.actions: No change on the output

tests.description: There should be only one page list
tests.actions: The second occurrence of page list should be flagged

tests.description: There should be only one TOC reference
tests.actions: The second occurrence of TOC should be flagged

tests.description: Calculation of bounds should include only the URL-s without fragment identifiers
tests.actions: The 'uniqueResources' array contains URL-s without fragments

tests.description: Each value on bounds should be different
tests.actions: The 'uniqueResources' array contains unique URL-s only

tests.description: The manifest may be linked via a 'link' element in the primary entry page
tests.actions: The separate manifest file (link_6.01.jsonld) should be processed and generated

tests.description: The manifest may embedded, via a 'script' element, into the primary entry page
tests.actions: The embedded manifest should be processed and generated

tests.description: If the 'name' entry is not present, the 'title' element of the primary entry page may be used instead
tests.actions: The embedded manifest should be processed and generated with an additional name

tests.description: When reusing the title for 'name', the language and direction set in HTML is valid
tests.actions: The embedded manifest should be processed and generated with an additional name

tests.description: If the 'readingOrder' is empty, the URL of the Primary Entry Page is used as a default
tests.actions: The embedded manifest should be processed and generated with the reading order set to the HTML's URL. The value should also be present in the 'uniqueResources' array.

tests.description: There should be either a 'name' or a usable 'title' in the Primary Entry Page.
tests.actions: A "no title" name should be added
tests.errors: Validation error on a missing default title

tests.description: A manifest may be linked via a 'link' element in the primary entry page, with the TOC reference in the manifest
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: A manifest without a TOC may be linked via a 'link' element in the primary entry page but with a TOC within the HTML file
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: A manifest may be embedded via a 'script' element in the primary entry page, with the TOC reference in the manifest
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: A manifest without a TOC embedded via a 'script' element in the primary entry page but with a TOC within the HTML file
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: There must be a TOC, either in the manifest (linked or embedded) or in the Primary Entry Page
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: Correct audio manifest, usable for testing overall setup
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: Minimally correct audio manifest, usable for testing overall setup
tests.actions: Output the manifest

tests.description: If no 'type' is set, the term 'Audiobook' is used
tests.actions: The Audiobook type should be added

tests.description: The audiobook defines a number of recommended properties (see §5.5)
tests.actions: All the recommended properties in §5.5 should be reported as missing
tests.errors: Validation errors for the list of recommended properties

tests.description: The global duration value, if present, should be the sum of the durations in the reading order
tests.actions: Output the manifest
tests.errors: Validation errors for inconsistent duration value

tests.description: All entries in `readingOrder` should have their duration values set
tests.actions: Output the manifest
tests.errors: Validation errors for the missing duration value

tests.description: The 'readingOrder' must have at least one audio object
tests.actions: Empty manifest should be returned
tests.errors: Fatal error on missing audio file

tests.description: All 'readingOrder' values must be an audio object
tests.actions: The manifest should be returned with last-but-one entry removed (only audio object remain)
tests.errors: Validation error on that extra item

tests.description: A cover page should be set
tests.actions: Links with 'rel' including cover should be reported as missing
